Question
========

A pure coin is tossed fifty times. The *sample proportion* of the number of times cross above is equal to 0.6. How many *standard errors* (se) is this result above the mean of the *sampling distribution* of the *sample proportion*?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.10 se
* 0.60 se
* 1.142 se

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.10 se: Incorrect
* 0.60 se: Incorrect
* 1.142 se: Correct
